HP Google Chrome OS Chromebook is a computer for the way the modern world works, with thousands of apps, built-in virus protection and cloud backups. It is secure, fast, up-to-date, versatile and simple.
Intel Celeron processor N3350 Enjoy a computer with an Intel Celeron processor. Experience Intel performance with entertainment features and fast connectivity. The Intel Celeron processor delivers performance in a new computer that fits your lifestyle and budget.
11.6″ display Typical 1366 x 768 HD resolution. Energy-efficient WLED backlight. Intel HD Graphics 500 On-processor graphics with shared video memory provide everyday image quality for Internet use, basic photo editing and casual gaming.
4GB system memory for basic multitasking Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once.
32GB eMMC flash memory This ultracompact memory system is ideal for mobile devices and applications, providing enhanced storage capabilities, streamlined data management, quick boot-up times and support for high-definition video playback.

The quality of Samsung Meets the accessibility of chrome OS. Its all-new light and compact design lets you stream, work, create, and play on a fast, secure device designed to take everywhere. You can download and save content and work with others using Google suite. Built with long-lasting battery and Gigabit Wi-Fi connectivity, The new Samsung Chromebook 4 brings speed and efficiency to any and every task or adventure.
Compact, light design with 11. 6” display
Military-grade durability
Ultra-fast connectivity with Gigabit Wi-Fi
Advanced security with multiple layers of built-in virus protection
12. 5 hours of battery life
Google Assistant enabled

Samsung Chromebook 4 11.6″

The quality of Samsung meets the accessibility of Chrome OS. Its all-new light and compact design lets you stream, work, create, and play on a fast, secure device designed to take everywhere. You can download and save content and work with others using Google Suite. Built with long-lasting battery and Gigabit Wi-Fi connectivity, the new Samsung Chromebook 4 brings speed and efficiency to any and every task or adventure.

Specifications

  • Operating System: Chrome OS
  • Processor: Intel Celeron Processor N4000
  • System Memory: 4GB LPDDR4/4GB x 1, Max 4GB
  • Storage: 32GB eMMC
  • Display: 11.6″ HD LED (1366 x 768)

Read more

Product Features

Just your size

Slim, under 3 pounds, and with military-grade durability*, it’s made to handle bumps and drops. Plus, it comes with a full-sized keyboard and trackpad.

Google makes it easy.

Access the world of Google. Use Google Docs, Google Drive, the Google Play Store and more.

Ultra-fast connectivity

With a lightning fast Gigabit Wi-Fi connection, stream or download massive files rapidly.

Read more

Protected inside and out

Multiple layers of built-in virus protection guard against malicious malware. Automatic updates ensure you always have the latest in security protection.

Power through your day.

Delivers up to 12 hours** of battery on a full charge that quickly recharges on a USB-C charger.

Just say the word.

Use your voice to make a request and Google Assistant will get it done—whether you want to update your calendar or reply to a message, make a note or check the news.

Read more

*Meets eight military-grade (MIL-STD-810G) standards including: transit drop, vibration, high temperature, temperature shocks, freezing, dust, humidity, low pressure.

**A Measured according to Google Scenario (Power Load Test) criteria. (Tested Product Specifications: Intel Celeron Processor N4000 / 4GB Memory / 32GB eMMC). Battery life may vary depending on network environment, usage patterns and other factors.

4.5

Price: $138.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Small size–saving space

Small dimension (106 x 106 x 18 mm) and light weight (232g) make the mini pc more convenient to carry outside. You can also hang it behind the monitor, which greatly saves your space.

4K Dual display

Beelink T4 Pro can give you wonderful visual enjoyment thanks to the built-in HD Graphic 500. You can smoothly enjoy the 4K videos. Meanwhile, you can connect 2 displays at the same time with 2 HDMI ports, which greatly saves your time.

CPU: Apollo Lake Processor N3350

Beelink T4 Pro Mini PC is equipped with N3350 Processor (2M Cache, 1.10GHz up to 2.40GHz) and pre-installed with Win 10. The powerful hardware gives you a stable Internet environment.

Storage

Built-in 4GB LPDDR3 RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer has enough storage space for you to deal with daily work, watch videos, browse the Internet, home entertainment, etc. Fully meets your daily needs.

Dual WiFi and Bluetooth

T4 Pro Mini PC provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 4.0. You can enjoy stable wireless connection and high transfer speed.

Heat sink and fan

The powerful heat dissipation function (built-in heat sink and quiet fan) enables the mini desktop computer to cool down in time, improving the operating efficiency.

Interface: 1 x DC in port, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x LAN port, 2 x HDMI ports, 1x Audio Jack (HP&MIC)Packages: 1 x T4 Pro Mini PC, 1 x HDMI Cable (100cm), 1 x Power Adapter 12V/1.5-2A, 1 x User Manual

[N3350 Processor] Beelink T4 Pro mini pc has installed with Win 10 Apollo Lake Processor N3350 which has 2M Cache, 1.1GHz up to 2.4GHz. It provides a stable environment for work and entertainment.
[4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM] Loaded with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer could offer you enough memory storage to meet your daily needs such as entertainment, video, web browsing, and work.
[Dual HDMI] With 2 HDMI ports, the mini pc can easily connects 2 monitors at the same time. Meanwhile, it comes with HD Graphics 500 so you can enjoy the web surfing, home theater, game and so on with your family members.
[Dual WiFi and Bluetooth] The mini pc provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi and Gigabit Ethernet. It means that you can transfer and download data at a high speed. Besides, you are available to connect with many devices which support Bluetooth connection because of the built-in Bluetooth 4.0.
[Ultra-thin Stylish Design] Thanks to the ultra thin design (106 x 106 x 18 mm and light weight of 232g), this mini pc can be hang behind the monitor and even carried on the journey, which can greatly save your space. Besides, it has the fan and heat sink to cool down the pc and make the cpu and hard drive work normal.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:54 UTC – Details)


The ASUS Laptop L210MA is designed to help you be productive all day — even when you’re on the move. This compact and lightweight 11.6 inch laptop is powered by the latest Intel® processor and provides long lasting battery life. With eMMC storage and pre-loaded Windows 10 in S mode, this laptop offers full compatibility with a wide range of software and peripherals. This laptop is the best laptop for people on the go. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3.0, 3.1, 3.2 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment. For Free Windows 11 upgrade eligible devices, visit ASUS Windows 11 website for more information.
Efficient Intel Celeron N4020 Processor 1.1 GHz (4M Cache, up to 2.8 GHz)
11.6” HD (1366 x 768) Slim Display
64GB eMMC Flash Storage and 4GB LPDDR4 RAM
Slim and Portable: 0.7” thin and weighs only 2.31 lbs (battery included)


Previous page

  1. Reinventing the Touchpad

    The new ASUS NumberPad makes number-crunching a whole lot easier. Simply tap the icon to turn it on, Everything you need is printed on the touchpad.

  2. Easy Idea Sharing

    A cleverly designed 180° lay-flat hinge makes it easy to share content or collaborate with friends.

  3. Get It Done, Anywhere

    With the compact and lightweight ASUS L210, productivity is always within reach. It easily slips into a backpack so you can create content anywhere.

  4. Keep On Going

    With ASUS L210, you can leave the heavy power adaptor at home. Its day-long battery life gives you the flexibility to work or play anywhere.

Next page

Previous page

  1. Go For Your Goals

    With Windows 10 Home S, an Intel Celeron processor, and 64GB SSD, ASUS E210 is well-equipped to help you achieve your goals.

  2. Input Has Never Been Easier

    L210 comes with a keyboard with long key travel and a large 6-inch multitouch pad with palm-rejection technology offers excellent experience.

  3. Silence is Golden

    The fanless design keeps noise levels down, so you won’t be distracted when working on a spreadsheet or watching a movie.

  4. Get More With MyASUS

    Link to MyASUS is a handy tool thatʹs part of the MyASUS app. It seamlessly integrates ASUS PC with mobile devices, allowing easier multitasking.

Next page
